answers.answer: Also I do have shoulder pain, back pain and neck pain
Well part of it sounds like gastritis GERD and WHAT'S fussing? Possible some stress. But sounds more like GERD
I am having giddiness when I am hungry
Doctor puts me on antacid and then i am normal. but after few days again have the same problem. Dont' know what to do. Is there any proper diet for this

I THINK. U need to go to a gastro doc. Maybe u need a. Stronger medecine. And a good diet is not to eat Apach foods, no foods with so many grease and I found out that pizza, menudo, and Mexican foods are bad for GERD
sorry my phone is weird lol. Don't eat spicy foods pizza is very bad for GERD

question: Since one year i have stomach bloating, belching. Since 2 weeks I feel somthing is stuck in my throat, but am able to eat food and drink food. The moment i feel hungry, if i dont eat food, I sort of feeling giddy. Also I have small burning sensation in the stomach. I do fart very often. Also, I am putting on weight.Recently I got my thyroid test. The values are TSH - 3.5(withing 0.5 -5.5) , TT3 - 118(within 74-200), TT4 - 6.9 (within 7.3 - 15). Also, in the afternoon, when I am hungry, I have severe headache (forehead). I do not have diabetes.
title: Have stomach bloating, stomach pain, somthing in the throat
